sentences.en: 'Do you feel, yet, that you belong to this terrestrial scheme again, Mr. Darnay?'
sentences.cn: “ 你现在觉得回到了这个扰攘的人世了么, 达尔内先生? ”

sentences.en: Aquatic ecosystems share a number of basic structural and functional characteristics with terrestrial ecosystems.
sentences.cn: 水生生态系统的结构和机能,在许多基本特征方面同陆地生态系统一样.

sentences.en: Aquatic food chains are different from terrestrial ones.
sentences.cn: 水生食物链不同于陆地食物链.

sentences.en: Concepts that seem likely to contribute to terrestrial agriculture will be identified.
sentences.cn: 可能对陆生农业作出贡献的一些新概念将得到验证.

sentences.en: digital terrestrial and digital satellite broadcasting
sentences.cn: 数字陆上广播和数字卫星广播

sentences.en: For terrestrial communities the principal variables are availability and temperature.
sentences.cn: 对于陆地群落,最主要是可用性和温度.

sentences.en: In rugby circles, there is nothing but criticism for the coverage of sport on terrestrial TV.
sentences.cn: 橄榄球界对于地面无线电视对他们运动的报道只有批评意见.

sentences.en: New inert gas data from terrestrial rocks has also raised other questions about the evolving earth.
sentences.cn: 地球岩石中惰性气体的新资料,为我们提出了与演变中的地球有关的许多其它方面的问题.

sentences.en: Newton proposed that heavenly and terrestrial motion could be unified with the idea of gravity.
sentences.cn: 牛顿提出天体和地球的运动可以用万有引力来解释。

sentences.en: Terrestrial latitude is measured in degrees north or south from the equator.
sentences.cn: 地球纬度是从赤道向南或向北以度数来表示.

sentences.en: Terrestrial longitude is measured in degrees east or west of the Greenwich meridian.
sentences.cn: 地球的经度是用格林尼治子午线向东或向西的度数来表示的.

sentences.en: The dark vault surrounded the terrestrial globe as if to crush it.
sentences.cn: 阴森森的天空罩在地球上,好象要把它压扁似的.

sentences.en: The gills of fishes are analogous to the lungs in terrestrial animals.
sentences.cn: 鱼类的鳃与陆上动物的肺类似.

sentences.en: The various theories can be grouped into astronomical and terrestrial hypotheses.
sentences.cn: 各种理论可以分成天体说和地球说两大类.

sentences.en: Yes, I have learned a lot of knowledge about the globe from my terrestrial globe.
sentences.cn: 了解, 我从地球仪上学到了许多关于地球的知识.

words.tran_cn: 玻璃容器；陆地动物饲养所
[天]地球的；[生物]陆地的，陆生的；人间的

trans.tran_cn: 陆地的，地球的，人间的，<天>类地行星的
trans.tran_en: relating to the Earth rather than to the moon or other  planets
